hooks.command: node -e "const f=process.env.CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH||'';if(/\.(js|ts|jsx|tsx)$/.test(f)){const {readFileSync}=require('fs');try{const src=readFileSync(f,'utf8');const m=src.match(/console\.log\(/g);if(m&&m.length>0)console.warn('[warn] '+f+' has '+m.length+' console.log() call(s). Consider removing before shipping.');}catch(e){}}"

node -e "const cmd=(process.env.CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_COMMAND||'').trim();const devPat=[/npm.*dev/,/yarn.*dev/,/pnpm.*dev/,/next.*dev/,/vite/,/webpack.*serve/,/react-scripts start/];if(devPat.some(p=>p.test(cmd))&&!process.env.TMUX)console.warn('[warn] Dev server outside tmux — will die when session ends.')"
node -e "const cmd=(process.env.CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_COMMAND||'').trim();if(/git push/.test(cmd))console.warn('[checkpoint] About to git push. Verify changes are reviewed and tests pass.')"
